objects.description: Check for potential malicious definitions of URL schemes when vetting applications. Also, when examining apps for potential vulnerabilities, encourage use of universal links as an alternative to URL schemes. When examining apps that use OAuth, encourage use of best practices.(Citation: Apple-UniversalLinks)(Citation: IETF-OAuthNativeApps)

external_references.description: Apple. (n.d.). Support Universal Links. Retrieved December 21, 2016.
W. Denniss and J. Bradley. (2017, October). IETF RFC 8252: OAuth 2.0 for Native Apps. Retrieved November 30, 2018.
